attributes.action: Fight for the freedom within your property!
attributes.additional_details:
Should you be allowed to defend your home from intruders without being the guilty one? Yes.

Should you be allowed to have freedom within our own property without it effecting the well-being of others? Yes.

For what little freedom we have now the one freedom we shouldn't have taken away from us is freedom within our own home.

From defending your home from intruders, to growing a few cannabis on in your property. If they intrude without welcome you should able to take force and if any drugs are caught outside your property you should be harshly punished. Eliminate the thugs and eliminate the drug dealers as well saving police money on petty little crimes.
